title: Luxury Five-Star Lebanese Ski Resort Escape near Beirut
description: Ideally set on the slopes of Lebanon's Mzaar Kfardebian peaks, the InterContinental Mzaar Mountain Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel, invites you to discover the epitome of luxury and wellbeing from within its five-star atmosphere. With seven restaurants and bars, enjoy an eclectic journey through Lebanese and international cuisine, with something to suit every taste. Spend your days swapping between the heated swimming pool, spa, cinema and an abundance of outdoor activities.
